review.title: “Overall, a close-knit family type work environment.”
review.pros: Pros – Family type atmosphere. Stable company in bad ecomony. Freedom to think on your own and find solutions to a variey of issues.
review.cons: Cons – Compensation is lacking for comparable positions elsewhere. Employees are required to wear multiple hats and be in too many places at once.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue to revamp company structure and add positions that allow more specific job responsibilites to all employees so they can be more efficient.
